00012 template <typename T>
00013 vector<Point_<T> > MxArrayToVecPt(MxArray& arr)
00014 {
00015     vector<MxArray> va = arr.toVector<MxArray>();
00016     vector<Point_<T> > vp;
00017     vp.reserve(va.size());
00018     for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=va.begin(); it<va.end(); ++it)
00019         vp.push_back((*it).toPoint_<T>());
00020     return vp;
00021 }

00024 template <typename T>
00025 vector<Point3_<T> > MxArrayToVecPt3(MxArray& arr)
00026 {
00027     vector<MxArray> va = arr.toVector<MxArray>();
00028     vector<Point3_<T> > vp;
00029     vp.reserve(va.size());
00030     for (vector<MxArray>::iterator it=va.begin(); it<va.end(); ++it)
00031         vp.push_back((*it).toPoint3_<T>());
00032     return vp;
00033 }

00035 
00043 void mexFunction( int nlhs, mxArray *plhs[],
00044                   int nrhs, const mxArray *prhs[] )
00045 {
00046     // Check the number of arguments
00047     if (nrhs<3 || ((nrhs%2)!=0) || nlhs>2)
00048         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Wrong number of arguments");
00049     
00050     // Argument vector
00051     vector<MxArray> rhs(prhs,prhs+nrhs);
00052     
00053     Mat cameraMatrix(rhs[2].toMat(CV_32F));
00054     Mat distCoeffs((nrhs>3) ? rhs[3].toMat(CV_32F) : Mat());
00055     
00056     // Option processing
00057     bool useExtrinsicGuess=false;
00058     int iterationsCount=100;
00059     float reprojectionError=8.0;
00060     int minInliersCount=100;
00061     Mat rvec, tvec;
00062     for (int i=4; i<nrhs; i+=2) {
00063         string key = rhs[i].toString();
00064         if (key=="UseExtrinsicGuess")
00065             useExtrinsicGuess = rhs[i+1].toBool();
00066         else if (key=="IterationsCount")
00067             iterationsCount = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00068         else if (key=="ReprojectionError")
00069             reprojectionError = rhs[i+1].toDouble();
00070         else if (key=="MinInliersCount")
00071             minInliersCount = rhs[i+1].toInt();
00072         else if (key=="Rvec")
00073             rvec = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00074         else if (key=="Tvec")
00075             tvec = rhs[i+1].toMat(CV_32F);
00076         else
00077             mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Unrecognized option");
00078     }
00079     
00080     // Process
00081     Mat inliers;
00082     if (rhs[0].isNumeric() && rhs[1].isNumeric()) {
00083         Mat objectPoints(rhs[0].toMat(CV_32F)), imagePoints(rhs[1].toMat(CV_32F));
00084         solvePnPRansac(objectPoints, imagePoints, cameraMatrix, distCoeffs, rvec,
00085             tvec, useExtrinsicGuess, iterationsCount, reprojectionError,
00086             minInliersCount, inliers);
00087     }
00088     else if (rhs[0].isCell() && rhs[1].isCell()) {
00089         vector<Point3f> objectPoints(rhs[0].toVector<Point3f>());
00090         vector<Point2f> imagePoints(rhs[1].toVector<Point2f>());
00091         solvePnPRansac(objectPoints, imagePoints, cameraMatrix, distCoeffs, rvec,
00092             tvec, useExtrinsicGuess, iterationsCount, reprojectionError,
00093             minInliersCount, inliers);
00094     }
00095     else
00096         mexErrMsgIdAndTxt("mexopencv:error","Invalid argument");
00097 
00098     plhs[0] = MxArray(rvec);
00099     if (nlhs>1)
00100         plhs[1] = MxArray(tvec);
00101     if (nlhs>2)
00102         plhs[2] = MxArray(inliers);
00103 }
